Easy cleaning: The cleaning of the small dustpan and brush set is also very simple, requiring only a short period of rinsing and drying, and it will take on a new look, providing unparalleled convenience for your daily cleaning tasks.
A unique gift choice: Hand bloom and dustpan set is not only an excellent cleaning tool, but also a unique gift choice We value every customer and strive to meet their needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Little yellow chicken has also come to introduce you! Whether it's home cleaning or dealing with small clutter, our small dustpan and brush set is like my cleaning tool and is definitely your perfect choice.

Dustpan and brush set specifications: -Size: 6.69 * 6.29 inches -Material: High quality material -Color: Cute yellow -Can be wall mounted or vertically stored Convenient storage: This dustpan design is very clever, whether you choose to hang it on the wall or place it in a corner, it won't take up too much space, and the home is neat and orderly. Clean dead corners without leaving any dead corners: Whether it's corners or narrow areas, you can easily handle them. You don't have to worry about areas that are difficult to clean anymore, because the rubber boom is like my little partner, and it's not a problem. Precision brush hair design: The hand brush hair design is fine and sturdy, densely arranged, and can be cleaned cleanly. It can penetrate into fine crevices, ensuring thorough cleaning every time.

Usage: 1. With a gentle brush, as if I were walking on the grass, aim the bristles of the broom at the area that needs to be cleaned. 2. Press the handle and let the precision bristles and I thoroughly clean up debris and dust together. 3.After cleaning, you can hang it on the wall or stand like me for future use. Packaging content: -1 x small bloom and dustpan set mini Multi functional cleaning: Mini Boom is truly a versatile little guy who can handle various cleaning tasks, including: -Dust on the desktop -Peels left by snacks -The gap between the window sill and furniture -Little things left by children's handicraft classes -Little Pet's Urine

No longer bothered by debris and dust! Our desktop broom with one brush cleaning tool will bring convenience and cleanliness to your life, keeping your home always neat and refreshing. Whether dealing with daily cleaning or small areas of debris, it is your reliable companion. Hurry up and purchase to make cleaning easier and more enjoyable. Let's sweep together with the little yellow chicken!
Tip: -Avoid forceful brushing of vulnerable items. -Regularly brush the broom and take a bath to maintain its cleaning effect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bit the dust
reviews.reviewText: Very bright and cute. Brush works well. I use it a lot for cold ashes from my wood stove. also keep a set in all my vehicles to keep floor mats clean. I'm on a mountain so fir needles everrywhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this super cute little dustpan for my 4 year old to use and her 7 year old cousin. We use it to clean up their food messes at the table. It is such a great size for little kids to use to practice learning how to clean up after themselves. Mastering this skill takes the work off of the parents shoulders too so score!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not even worth a dollar from the a dollar store. What a joke! Thin, flimsy and doesn’t even sweep into the pan, any pressure that is applied on any level it bends and bows it. Cheap cheap and more cheap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap but super cute
reviews.reviewText: This little dust bin set is perfect for keeping in my cats litter box enclose for easy cleanups but it is super cheap feeling. If you need it for something tiny and for gentle use, it’s adorable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny sweeper for tiny messes
reviews.reviewText: My 4 year old has been more interested in cleaning up after himself (yay!), so I thought this set would be perfect for him. He can easily sweep up his crumbs and other small messes, and he absolutely loves the little chicken design. The handles fit perfectly in his hands, and both pieces are lightweight yet sturdy. Great value for a great little broom/dustpan set!
